Title: The Legend of Zorro
Writer: Roberto Orci (screenplay), Alex Kurtzman (screenplay), Roberto Orci (story), Alex Kurtzman (story), Ted Elliott (story), Terry Rossio (story), Johnston McCulley (character)
Actors: Alberto Reyes, Julio Oscar Mechoso, Gustavo Sánchez Parra, Adrian Alonso
Plot: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.
Production: Tornado Productions Inc., Spyglass Entertainment, Columbia Pictures Corporation, Amblin Entertainment
